text: hong kong has been hit by a surge in
coronavirus infections that has
overwhelmed the territory's health care
system show you some pictures from the
caritas medical center in hong kong
where dozens of patients are being
treated on stretchers outside the
hospital in the open air more than four
thousand new cases were reported on
wednesday that's a new record hong kong
pursues a zero coveted policy but
without the strict mass testing and
lockdown seen in mainland china
well china's president xi jinping has
urged the territories leaders to take
all necessary measures to control this
latest surge our reporter martin yip
gave me more about how hong kong leaders
were reacting to that demand
